alert.note: Alert for Goochland; Hanover; Louisa (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 05 at 4:21PM EDT until August 05 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wakefield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Louisa County in central Virginia... Southeastern Goochland County in central Virginia... West central Hanover County in central Virginia... * Until 500 PM EDT. * At 421 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Sabot, or 8 miles east of Goochland, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Oilville around 430 PM EDT. Montpelier around 500 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Rockville, Dabneys, Crozier, Vontay, Johnsons Springs, Goodall and Mabelton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 757-899-2415, posting to the NWS Wakefield Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSWAKEFIELDVA.
